scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "npm start -w app" "npm run launch" "holochain-playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:zomes && sh optimize-wasms.sh && npm run package -w app && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/gather.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network -b https://bootstrap.holo.host webrtc wss://signal.holo.host
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
